validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Volume & Travel Time Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. This entry links Carto's Travel Time & Speed product to the initial TDM validation study so numeric scores can be added later.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report describes CWGP referencing and delivery expectations but no formal metadata rating.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Report includes anonymized accuracy measures across vendors, not vendor-specific MDODE-style scores.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Operational behavior (uptime, latency) is discussed qualitatively via submission logistics only.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Documentation expectations are implicit in RFP and process, not graded.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. CWGP and standard formats support integration but are not mapped to a numeric score.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Volume & Travel Time Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. HERE Travel Time & Speed is part of the initial TDM validation activity.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. New CWGP georeferencing and format expectations are documented but not rated.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Accuracy comparisons to NCDOT reference data are reported in aggregate, not as a MDODE score.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Real-time vs non-real-time submissions discussed, but no quantified uptime/latency.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. No explicit assessment of HERE documentation in the report.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Standardized location referencing and formats support extensibility but are not scored.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Volume & Travel Time Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. INRIX Travel Time & Speed is one of the vendors evaluated in the initial TDM validation.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report focuses on methods and logistics for TT/Speed data, not formal metadata scoring.

operational_notes: Not yet scored. Operational issues are treated as process feedback rather than quantified metrics.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. No explicit grading of INRIX documentation, examples, or change logs.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Integration assumptions (CWGP, formats) described but not translated into MDODE numeric values.

documentation_notes: Not yet scored. User documentation quality is not rated in the report.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Extensibility is implied via common formats and location referencing but not quantified.

evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. Timmons' Travel Time & Speed feed participated in the initial validation activity.

validation_report_title: TDM Validation Activity: Georgia Volume Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. HERE's Volume product is part of the Georgia volume validation alongside other vendors.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report specifies CWGP, mandatory deliverables and formats but no numeric metadata grade.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Detailed error metrics (e.g., percent error, MAPE by volume range) are provided but anonymized by vendor label A–E.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Operational characteristics (e.g., disruptions to supply chains) are noted qualitatively only.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Questionnaire captures product characteristics but does not rate documentation quality numerically.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Extensibility can be inferred from support for required products and formats but is not assigned a score.

validation_report_title: TDM Validation Activity: Georgia Volume Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. INRIX Volume is one of the five vendors evaluated in the Georgia volume study and prior NC study.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Metadata expectations and questionnaire responses are qualitative, not scored 0–100.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Vendor-specific accuracy metrics exist but are anonymized; they cannot be cleanly mapped to a single MDODE number.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Study comments on supply-chain disruptions and product maturity but not as MDODE operational metrics.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Questionnaire captures product description and methods only.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Support for multiple aggregations (AADT, ADT, AHDT, daily, hourly) demonstrates extensibility but is not graded.

validation_report_title: TDM Validation Activity: Georgia Volume Study
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. Iteris Volume is evaluated as part of the Georgia and earlier North Carolina volume studies.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report lays out expected volume deliverables but does not rank Iteris' metadata.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Iteris accuracy is embedded in the anonymized vendor results (A–E) and not mapped to MDODE.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Operational resilience and data disruptions are described generically.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. No explicit documentation grade.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Ability to deliver multiple aggregations indicates extensibility but is not quantified.

documentation_notes: Not yet scored. No numeric documentation score is provided.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Multi-product volume outputs indicate extensibility but remain unscored.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Origin-Destination Study
validation_study_period: Study period as defined in TDM-VAL-06 (Richmond sample OD analysis)
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. AirSage OD is one of four OD products examined in the initial OD validation study.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report describes LBS-based OD product characteristics and schema but not via numeric metadata scoring.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Analysis checks for intuitive OD patterns and reasonable trip statistics rather than a 0–100 MDODE score.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Delivery lag and update cadence are described but not converted into MDODE operational metrics.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Access methods and schema are documented, but no formal documentation grade is given.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Filtering by time, geography, and trip purpose plus CSV delivery indicate extensibility, but it is not scored.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Origin-Destination Study
validation_study_period: Study period as defined in TDM-VAL-06 (Richmond sample OD analysis)
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. Geotab OD (Altitude platform) is evaluated as a commercial-fleet-based OD product.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Vendor questionnaire and product description provide rich metadata but not a numeric score.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Study inspects OD patterns by vehicle class, vocation, and industry rather than assigning a 0–100 score.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Web UI and API performance are described at a capability level, not scored.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. OD access and query-definition workflow are explained but not graded.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Strong filtering, zone definitions, and API support imply extensibility without a numeric rating.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Origin-Destination Study
validation_study_period: Study period as defined in TDM-VAL-06 (Richmond sample OD analysis)
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. INRIX OD is assessed based on trip-level CSV deliveries and flexible spatial aggregation.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. Report emphasizes fields like start/end time and coordinates and privacy measures, not MDODE metadata scoring.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Comparative analysis focuses on intuitive OD patterns and trip statistics across vendors.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Discussion of data lags and delivery via AWS is qualitative only.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Documentation quality (e.g., API docs) is not explicitly evaluated.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Ability to map trips to any zone system via spatial joins demonstrates extensibility but is not scored.

validation_report_title: Initial TDM Validation Activity: Origin-Destination Study
validation_study_period: Study period as defined in TDM-VAL-06 (Richmond sample OD analysis)
evaluator_notes: MDODE scores not assigned. StreetLight OD (LBS and CV-based) is evaluated for internal consistency and intuitive patterns.
metadata_notes: Not yet scored. OD schema and mode mix are described but not graded.
data_quality_notes: Not yet scored. Study looks at agreement in top origins/destinations and OD pairs, not a numeric MDODE score.
operational_notes: Not yet scored. Data delivery lag and historical coverage are described qualitatively.
documentation_notes: Not yet scored. Web UI and export capabilities are documented but not rated.
extensibility_notes: Not yet scored. Flexible temporal, modal, and spatial filters indicate high extensibility but are unscored.
